00101    OrigDestNode( uint32 itemID, uint32 mapID, uint32 offset )
00102       : RoutingNode(true){
00103       init();

00105       m_mapID  = mapID;
00106       m_offset = offset;
00107

00109       m_cost          = 0;
00110       m_estimatedCost = 0;
00111    }

00292 inline void 
00293 OrigDestNode::dump()
00294 {
00295    mc2log << info  << " mapID " << m_mapID << " itemID " << hex
00296           << m_itemID << dec << " offset " << m_offset << endl
00297           << " index " << m_nodeIndex << " lat " << m_lat 
00298           << " lon " << m_lon << " cost " << m_cost 
00299           << " estim " << m_estimatedCost 
00300           << " turn " << m_turnCost 
00301           << " startDir " << m_startDir << endl;
